root.name: remove()

example.code: FloatList inventory def setup(): size(200, 200) inventory = FloatList() inventory.append(108.6) inventory.append(5.8) inventory.append(8.2) println(inventory) inventory.remove(1) println(inventory)

FloatList inventory def setup(): size(200, 200) inventory = FloatList() inventory.append(108.6) inventory.append(5.8) inventory.append(8.2) println(inventory) val = inventory.remove(1) println("The value " + val + " was removed.")

root.description: Remove an element from the specified index.
